Deities @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Bes]{Bes}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Desna]{Desna}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Gendowyn]{Gendowyn}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Halcamora]{Halcamora}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Irez]{Irez}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Kofusachi]{Kofusachi}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Lao Shu Po]{Lao Shu Po}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Nivi Rhombodazzle]{Nivi Rhombodazzle}

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Bit of Luck]{Bit of Luck}; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Lucky Break]{Lucky Break}

You're unnaturally lucky and keep out of harm's way.
name: Luck Domain
